artatawe

Class Auction

  • java.lang.Object
    • artatawe.Auction

  • public class Auction
extends java.lang.Object
    Auction is a class to create new auctions containing all the needed information for an auction and handling the actions associated with an auction.
    Since:
    27-10-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Michael Lam

      An auction constructor with the information specifying an auction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Auction

        public Auction(User creator,
               double currentPrice,
               double reservePrice,
               int maxBids,
               Artwork artwork)
        An auction constructor with the information specifying an auction.
        Parameters:
        creator - The user who created the auction.
        currentPrice - The current price of the artwork being auctioned.
        reservePrice - The minimum reversation price of the artwork being auctioned.
        maxBids - The maximum number of bids that can be placed on a auction.
        artwork - The artwork being placed for auctioning.

      • Auction

        actionId - The ID of the auction.
        creator - The user who created the auction.
        currentPrice - The current price of the artwork being auctioned.
        reservePrice - The minimum reversation price of the artwork being auctioned.
        maxBids - The maximum number of bids that can be placed on a auction.
        artwork - The artwork being placed for auctioning.

        Returns:
